title: What are the best colleges at Dhaka in Bangladesh? - Quora

response.answer_text: Notre Dame College, Dhaka Teacher's Quality- Highly educated and brilliant. Students need not go to private tution or coaching if they are attentive to class lecture Political Situation- There is no politics at all in the campus. That’s why this is first choice for many students Study environment- Very much satisfactory. This college is reputed for its study environment. Here weekly exam (quiz exam) are held on the basis of a routine and there is a good pressure in studies, which ultimately results in good result Teacher's motivation- One phrase to describe it -”better than anyone”
In my opinionFor boys1.Notre Dame College2.Dhaka College3.Rajuk Uttara Model College For girls1. Holy Cross College 2. Viqarunnisa Noon School & College 3.Ideal School and College
